summary: This bill, the "Obligations to Aberdeen’s Trusted Heroes Act of 2025" (OATH Act), aims to ensure veterans who participated in secrecy oath programs (defined as programs involving non-disclosure agreements) receive full benefits. It mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to identify and notify these veterans about available benefits and distribute relevant information. The bill also specifies effective dates for disability compensation awards for these veterans and directs specific actions regarding the Edgewood Arsenal program participants.
